com.magnet.android.mms.connection

Interface ConnectionService.Request

  • Enclosing interface:
    ConnectionService

    public static interface ConnectionService.Request
    The generic request object that encapsulates headers and payload to be sent out to an endpoint.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConnectionService.Request.Method
      The HTTP request method.

    • Method Detail

      • setPath

        void setPath(String path)
        Set the path associated with the request. If this path starts with a "/" it will be interpreted as an absolute path from the host. Otherwise, it will be appended to the existing path. For example, if the connection's base is "http://foo.com/bar":
        • setPath("abc") results in "http://foo.com/bar/abc"
        • setPath("/abc") results in "http://foo.com/abc"

      • setMethod

        void setMethod(ConnectionService.Request.Method method)
        Sets the method for this request.
        Parameters:
        method - The method for this request.

      • setHeader

        void setHeader(String headerName,
             String headerValue)
        Adds or replaces the header name with the specified value.
        Parameters:
        headerName - The header name.
        headerValue - The value with which to add or replace the header name.

      • addHeaders

        void addHeaders(HashMap<String,String> headers)
        Adds all the headers from the specified header map. Any existing headers with the same name will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        headers - A map containing the headers to be added.

      • setHeaders

        void setHeaders(HashMap<String,String> headers)
        Removes the existing headers and adds the new headers.
        Parameters:
        headers - A map containing the new headers to be added.

      • removeHeader

        void removeHeader(String name)
        Removes a single header entry with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the header entry to be removed.

      • setContentType

        void setContentType(String mimeType)
        Set the mimetype associated with the payload.
        Parameters:
        mimeType - The mimetype to be associated with the payload.

      • setContentTransferEncoding

        void setContentTransferEncoding(String transferEncoding)
        Set the transfer encoding for the payload.
        Parameters:
        transferEncoding - The transfer encoding for the payload.

      • setPayload

        void setPayload(InputStream payload)
        Specifies the payload of the request. Any existing payload will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        payload - The payload of the request.

      • setPayload

        void setPayload(String payload)
        Specifies the payload of the request. Any existing payload will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        payload - The payload of the request.

      • setPayload

        void setPayload(byte[] bytes,
              int offset,
              int length)
        Specifies the payload of the request. Any existing payload will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The byte array of the request payload.
        offset - The offset into the byte array.
        length - The length of the byte array.

      • execute

        ConnectionService.Response execute()
                                   throws IOException
        Executes this request
        Returns:
        The response to the request.
        Throws:
        IOException
